languages.text: {n}"Нечисто". Вы обращаете внимание на пол вокруг трупа — ни брызг, ни ошметков плоти, ни удачно отпечатавшегося в крови ботинка преступника. Но... Нельзя было так изуродовать труп и совсем не запачкаться.{/n}

{n}"Bloody business." You turn your attention to the floor around the corpse. There is no spatter, no gobs of flesh, no bloody footprints fortuitously trailing into the dark. And yet... you know there is no way to butcher a corpse like that without getting dirty at all.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"Нечисто". Вы обращаете внимание на пол вокруг трупа — ни брызг, ни ошметков плоти, ни удачно отпечатавшегося в крови ботинка преступника. Но... Нельзя было так изуродовать труп и совсем не запачкаться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}"Something more." You turn your attention to the floor around the corpse. There is no spatter, no scraps of flesh, no bloody footprints fortuitously trailing into the dark. But... There is no way to butcher a corpse like that and not get dirty at all.{/n}

{n}"Bloody business." You turn your attention to the floor around the corpse. There is no spatter, no gobs of flesh, no bloody footprints fortuitously trailing into the dark. And yet... you know there is no way to butcher a corpse like that without getting dirty at all.{/n}

languages.text: {n}"Eine blutige Angelegenheit." Du richtest deine Aufmerksamkeit auf den Boden neben der Leiche. Es gibt keine Spritzer, keine Fleischfetzen und keine blutigen Spuren, die in die Dunkelheit führen. Und doch ... du weiß, dass man eine Leiche nicht derart zurichten kann, ohne sich schmutzig zu machen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"Bloody business." You turn your attention to the floor around the corpse. There is no spatter, no gobs of flesh, no bloody footprints fortuitously trailing into the dark. And yet... you know there is no way to butcher a corpse like that without getting dirty at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}"Eine blutige Angelegenheit." Du richtest deine Aufmerksamkeit auf den Boden neben der Leiche. Es gibt keine Spritzer, keine Fleischfetzen und keine blutigen Spuren, die in die Dunkelheit führen. Und doch ... du weiß, dass man eine Leiche nicht derart zurichten kann, ohne sich schmutzig zu machen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}« Quelle boucherie. » Vous portez votre attention sur le sol autour du cadavre. Vous ne remarquez aucune éclaboussure, aucun lambeau de chair, aucune empreinte sanglante se perdant dans l'obscurité. Et pourtant... vous savez qu'il est tout bonnement impossible de mutiler un cadavre de la sorte sans se salir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"Bloody business." You turn your attention to the floor around the corpse. There is no spatter, no gobs of flesh, no bloody footprints fortuitously trailing into the dark. And yet... you know there is no way to butcher a corpse like that without getting dirty at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}« Quelle boucherie. » Vous portez votre attention sur le sol autour du cadavre. Vous ne remarquez aucune éclaboussure, aucun lambeau de chair, aucune empreinte sanglante se perdant dans l'obscurité. Et pourtant... vous savez qu'il est tout bonnement impossible de mutiler un cadavre de la sorte sans se salir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}«Un asunto sangriento». Miras el suelo en torno al cadáver. No hay manchas, no hay trozos de carne, ni pisadas ensangrentadas que se pierden en la oscuridad. Sin embargo... no se puede descuartizar así un cadáver sin ensuciarte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"Bloody business." You turn your attention to the floor around the corpse. There is no spatter, no gobs of flesh, no bloody footprints fortuitously trailing into the dark. And yet... you know there is no way to butcher a corpse like that without getting dirty at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}«Un asunto sangriento». Miras el suelo en torno al cadáver. No hay manchas, no hay trozos de carne, ni pisadas ensangrentadas que se pierden en la oscuridad. Sin embargo... no se puede descuartizar así un cadáver sin ensuciarte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}「酷い仕事だ」と、あなたは死体周辺の床へと目を向ける。飛び散る血しぶきや肉の塊はなく、運よく暗闇に残った血塗れの足跡も存在しない。しかし、それでも…死体をあのように切り刻んでおいて、あなたはまったく汚れを残さない方法などないことをわかっていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"Bloody business." You turn your attention to the floor around the corpse. There is no spatter, no gobs of flesh, no bloody footprints fortuitously trailing into the dark. And yet... you know there is no way to butcher a corpse like that without getting dirty at all.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}「酷い仕事だ」と、あなたは死体周辺の床へと目を向ける。飛び散る血しぶきや肉の塊はなく、運よく暗闇に残った血塗れの足跡も存在しない。しかし、それでも…死体をあのように切り刻んでおいて、あなたはまったく汚れを残さない方法などないことをわかっていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个地方被弄得一片狼藉。你将注意力转向尸体周围的地板，地板上没有血迹，没有尸块，也没有在黑暗之中不小心留下的血脚印。不过你很清楚……既然把尸体弄成了这个样子，凶手身上一定会沾上血迹。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"Bloody business." You turn your attention to the floor around the corpse. There is no spatter, no gobs of flesh, no bloody footprints fortuitously trailing into the dark. And yet... you know there is no way to butcher a corpse like that without getting dirty at all.{/n}

languages.text: {n}"Lanet iş." Dikkatini cesedin etrafındaki zemine veriyorsun. Sıçrama yok, et parçaları yok, tesadüfen karanlığa doğru ilerleyen kanlı ayak izleri yok. Yine de... Bir cesedi böylesine paramparça edip üzerine bir şeyler bulaşmamasının imkânı olmadığını biliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"Bloody business." You turn your attention to the floor around the corpse. There is no spatter, no gobs of flesh, no bloody footprints fortuitously trailing into the dark. And yet... you know there is no way to butcher a corpse like that without getting dirty at all.{/n}
